description: Compliance & Audit Dashboard - GDPR compliance, data governance, access control auditing, encryption status, and regulatory compliance tracking for CHOM platform

panels.description: Overall compliance score (0-100) based on GDPR, data retention, encryption, and audit trail metrics
panels.title: Overall Compliance Score

panels.description: GDPR compliance status - percentage of requirements met
panels.title: GDPR Compliance Score

panels.description: Data breach risk assessment score (0-100) - lower is better
panels.title: Data Breach Risk Score

panels.description: Active compliance violations requiring remediation
panels.title: Active Violations

panels.description: Total compliance audits performed this month
panels.title: Audits This Month

panels.description: GDPR data subject requests (access, rectification, erasure, portability)
panels.title: GDPR Data Subject Requests

panels.description: GDPR request processing times - must comply with 30-day mandate
panels.title: GDPR Request Processing Time

panels.description: User consent tracking - active vs expired consents
panels.title: User Consent Status

panels.description: Personal data processing activities categorized by purpose
panels.title: Data Processing Activities by Purpose

panels.description: GDPR compliance violations requiring remediation
panels.title: GDPR Violations Over Time

panels.description: Data retention policy compliance rate
panels.title: Retention Policy Compliance

panels.description: Records exceeding retention period requiring deletion
panels.title: Records Exceeding Retention

panels.description: Automated data purges executed this month
panels.title: Data Purges (30d)

panels.description: Total storage used for audit logs and compliance data
panels.title: Audit Storage Usage

panels.description: Data lifecycle stages and volume distribution
panels.title: Data Lifecycle Distribution

panels.description: Access control audit events - privilege changes, role assignments, permission modifications
panels.title: Access Control Audit Events

panels.description: Recent audit log entries for compliance review
panels.title: Audit Log - Access Control Events

panels.description: Sensitive data access by role - ensures least privilege principle
panels.title: Sensitive Data Access by Role (24h)

panels.description: Admin privilege usage tracking for accountability
panels.title: Admin Privilege Usage

panels.description: Encryption coverage for data at rest
panels.title: Data-at-Rest Encryption Coverage

panels.description: Percentage of traffic using TLS/HTTPS
panels.title: Data-in-Transit Encryption (TLS)

panels.description: Unencrypted data volumes requiring encryption
panels.title: Unencrypted Data Volume

panels.description: Encryption key rotation status - days since last rotation
panels.title: Days Since Key Rotation

panels.description: Backup compliance metrics - frequency and retention adherence
panels.title: Backup Compliance Status

panels.description: TLS/SSL certificate expiration monitoring
panels.title: SSL Certificate Expiration Status

title: CHOM - Compliance & Audit
